rules: Rule1: In cases where the artwork is controversial, the artwork is censored.
Rule2: Whenever the artwork is controversial, it is not the case that the artwork is censored.
Rule3: Under the condition that the exhibition is popular, the exhibition is crowded.
Rule4: When the device has a technical issue, the device is operational.
Rule5: Whenever the device is malfunctioning, the device is not operational.
Rule6: Supposing that the device is tested, if the device has a technical issue, then the device is malfunctioning.
Rule7: When the curator approves the artwork, if the device is not modern, then the museum exhibits the device.
Rule8: Under the condition that the game is traditional, the artwork is included in the exhibition.
Rule9: Assuming that the game is interactive, either the curator approved the artwork or the director approved the artwork.
Rule10: Provided that the game is educational, the game is engaging.
Rule11: In cases where the game is designed for children, the game is accessible.
Rule12: The game is designed for children or the game is complex.
Rule13: Supposing that the game is complex, it is not the case that the game is engaging.
Rule14: When the exhibition is reviewed, if it is not the case that if the exhibition is scheduled for the period then the exhibition is open, then the period is extended.
Rule15: Provided that the director approves the artwork, if the device is not modern, then the museum exhibits the device.
Rule16: Either the corporate sponsor sponsors the exhibition or the government funds the exhibition.
Rule17: Under the condition that the government funds the exhibition, either the curator approved the artwork or the director approved the artwork.
Rule18: Provided that the exhibition is scheduled for the period, the exhibition is advertised.
Rule19: If the exhibition is advertised, then the exhibition is open.
Rule20: In cases where it is not the case that if the device is functional then if the device is not modern then the museum exhibits the device, the artwork is controversial.
Rule21: Whenever it is not the case that if the exhibition is crowded then the exhibition is visited, the device has a technical issue.
Rule22: Supposing that it is not the case that the game is traditional or the game is interactive, the game is educational.
Rule23: Provided that it is not the case that if the corporate sponsor sponsors the exhibition then the artwork is included in the exhibition, the exhibition is scheduled for the period.
Rule24: When it is not the case that if the exhibition is scheduled for the period then the exhibition is open, the exhibition is popular.
Rule25: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the exhibition is scheduled for the period then the exhibition is open, it is not the case that the exhibition is visited.
Rule26: Supposing that the device is not tested, the device is reliable.
Rule27: Provided that the device is not tested, it is not the case that the device is reliable.
facts: Fact3: It is not the case that the museum exhibits the device.
Fact4: It is not the case that the game is accessible.
Fact5: It is not the case that the period is extended.
